page.title: 06MARKET DEEPING SCHOOLS
page.content: In the Market Deeping County Primary School there are 365 pupils and 13 teaching staff.The school was built in 1969.The numbers of children are neither falling or rising.The children come from a wide radius.The school has a library,games field,2 halls,pottery area,4 computers,2 videos and musical instruments.Maths, English, Science and Computer Studies have become more important during the past few years.The school has had several new buildings. In the William Hildyard School there are 142 children.They only have 6 staff.The school was built in 1966.The numbers of children are rising.Again the children come from a wide radius.Science and Technology have become more important in the past few years.
